meanings.definition: A person who expresses emotions or feelings.
meanings.sent1: The emoters in the play made the audience feel sad.
meanings.sent2: She is known as one of the most expressive emoters in the theater group.
meanings.sent3: The emoters at the party were so animated, it was like watching a movie.
meanings.sent4: Her face was a canvas of emoters, painting a vivid picture of her inner thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The emoters on his face were like a colorful rainbow of feelings.

meanings.definition: To convey or communicate emotions or feelings.
meanings.sent1: They emoters their love for each other through their actions.
meanings.sent2: The singer emoters her heartbreak in every song she performs.
meanings.sent3: The puppy emoters excitement by wagging its tail vigorously.
meanings.sent4: His eyes emoters a deep sense of longing for his homeland.
meanings.sent5: The painting emoters a sense of peace and tranquility to all who view it.
